column6: It Leaves your Lips with a Lovely Rose/Pink Color
column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
column14: This lasts a very long time.  You could use it once a day, and then apply balms, glosses, or other lipsticks.  After they all wear off you would still have a rose/pink color to your lips.  I'm 63 and the pigment on my lips is not longer there.  Now, I wake up in the morning with color on my lips again.  You do not need to apply much of this stuff.  Thank you, Susan

column6: This lipstick stays on for longer than any I have ever used.
